scripts.build: set -e && echo 'Starting Flutter build process...' && curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.35.4-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && cd flutter && git config --global --add safe.directory $PWD && git fetch --unshallow || true && cd .. && echo 'Flutter version check:' && flutter --version && echo 'Configuring Flutter for web...' && flutter config --enable-web && echo 'Installing dependencies...' && flutter pub get && echo 'Building Flutter web app...' && flutter build web --release --base-href / && echo 'Build completed successfully!' && echo 'Verifying output structure:' && ls -la build/web/ && echo 'Checking for index.html:' && test -f build/web/index.html && echo 'index.html found - build successful!' || echo 'ERROR: index.html not found!'
